P3

接口 Action

  • 所有已知子接口:
    Game
    所有已知实现类:
    chessGame, goGame

    public interface Action
    作者:
    Shen

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean kill(Player player, Position source, Position target)
      Chess: kill a piece in the target position with the piece in the source position, the executor is player Go: kill a piece in the target position, assume the source is null
      boolean move(Player player, Position source, Position target)
      Chess: move a piece from the source position to the target position, the executor is player Go: move a piece to the target position, assume the source is null

    • 方法详细资料

      • move

        boolean move(Player player,
             Position source,
             Position target)
        Chess: move a piece from the source position to the target position, the executor is player Go: move a piece to the target position, assume the source is null
        参数:
        player - executor of moving
        source - the moving piece's source position, assume null if it's a go move
        target - the moving piece's target position
        返回:
        true if move is done, else false

      • kill

        boolean kill(Player player,
             Position source,
             Position target)
        Chess: kill a piece in the target position with the piece in the source position, the executor is player Go: kill a piece in the target position, assume the source is null
        参数:
        player - executor of killing
        source - the killing piece's position, assume null if it's a go
        target - the killed piece's position
        返回:
        true if kill is done, else false
